<NBX>
<UNQ>007154933_00204_TXT</UNQ>
<IMID>007154933_00204</IMID>
<APID>TH-1942-32880-28533-42</APID>
<IMGSIZE>5108,4238</IMGSIZE>
<PLACE><ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">United States</ENAMEX></PLACE>
<SBODY>4 0 0
( 1086 )
4, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">N. Y.</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">EXECUTON</ENAMEX>'S <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">DEED</ENAMEX>.
This <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">Indenture</ENAMEX>, Made this 12th
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Smith</ENAMEX> and ⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨ and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last Will and Testament</ENAMEX>
of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, late of the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>
of the first part, and <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Charles Lorence</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Margaret Lorence</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="FAMILYMEMBER">wife</ENAMEX>, of <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie
County</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX>,
of the second part,
⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨ and for and in consideration of the sum of <NUMEX TYPE="MONEY">Twenty four hundred and twenty-five Dollars</NUMEX> paid 
by the said part in, of the second part, the receipt whereof is hereby acknowledged, has granted barsinned sold and conveyor, and by these presents
do grant bargain, all and convay unto the said parties of the second part, and to <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX>, and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX> forever, all that Tract or
parcel of Land, situate in the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">State
of</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX> being part of Lot 71 and 72 <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Township Seven</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Range Eight</ENAMEX>
of the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Holland Land Companys</ENAMEX> Survey; and in a subdivision of
part of said Lots 71 and 72 made for the main <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Street Land and
Improvement Company</ENAMEX> by <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">C. F. Wilmer</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Surveyor</ENAMEX>, a map of which sub-
division is on file in <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Clerk's Office</ENAMEX> under Cover 292, the
premises hereby conveyed are designated as lot Fifteen ( 15) in Block
"B" and are described as follows:-
Beginning at a point in the southerly line of
<ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">four hundred and twenty ( 20)</NUMEX> feet easterly from its
intersection with the easterly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Cornell Street</ENAMEX>, running thence
easterly along said southerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty ( 30)</NUMEX> feet;
thence southerly at right angles to <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and
fifteen ( 15)</NUMEX> feet; thence westerly parallel with <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty
130</NUMEX> feet; and thence northerly at right angles <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and
fifteen ( 15)</NUMEX> feet to the said southerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX>, at the
place of beginning, and being the same premises conveyed with other
premises to said <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX> by <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Jacob Bonner</ENAMEX> by deed dated
<TIMEX TYPE="DATE">June 12, 1895</TIMEX>, recorded in <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Clerk's Office</ENAMEX> in <ENAMEX TYPE="WORK_OF_ART">Liber 802 of
Deeds</ENAMEX> at page 96, <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">July 2, 1895</TIMEX>.
4 0 1
( 1086 )
Cogether with all and singular the tenements, hereditaments and appurtenances thereto belonging or in anywise appertaining, and the reversions
and remainders, rents, issues and profits thereon. And all the estate, right, title, interest
<ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">ham</ENAMEX> and demand whatsoever, which the said <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">testator</ENAMEX> had in <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> use use, and at the time of <ENAMEX TYPE="CHEMICAL">mercury</ENAMEX>, and when the said party
of the first part have by virtue of the said last will and testament or otherwise, of, in and to the above described premises, and every part and parcel
thereof, with the appurtenances, to have and to hold forever. And the said part is of the first part, for themselk
and for <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">administrators</ENAMEX> do
covenant promise and agree to and with the said parties of the second part, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX>, that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> have not made done committed
executed or suffered any act or acts, thing or things whatsoever,
whereby, or by means whereof, the above mentioned and described premises, or any part or parcel thereof, now are, or at any time hereafter shall or may
be impeached, charged or encumbered in any way or manner whatsoever.
M Whess Whereof. The said parties of the first part have hereunto set <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> hand and seal the day and year first above written
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">SHATED</ENAMEX> AND DENEARD IN THE PRESENCE OF
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">John M. Smith</ENAMEX> ℗
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Louis ⎬ Smith</ENAMEX>
as <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Trustees</ENAMEX> under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the
<ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">Last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">STATE OF NEW YORK</ENAMEX>.
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie Cond</ENAMEX>
on <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">thee</ENAMEX> <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">12th</TIMEX>
before <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">me</ENAMEX>, the subscriber untimely use appeared ⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨e known to be
the <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last will</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schimite</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX> and to be the same 
lart of the person described in and <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">who</ENAMEX> executed the wooden frament, and severally acknowledged that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> executed the same. as <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Peter</ENAMEX> 
under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>,
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Eugene P. Ouchie</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Notary Public</ENAMEX> in and for
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">My</ENAMEX>.
__<TIMEX TYPE="DATE">12__ day of
Sc __1909</TIMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Lout</ENAMEX> --
</SBODY>
</NBX>

of the first part have by virtue of the said last will and testament or otherwise, of, in and to the above described premises, and every part and parcel
thereof, with the appurtenances, to have and to hold forever. And the said part is of the first part, for themselk
and for <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">administrators</ENAMEX> do
covenant promise and agree to and with the said parties of the second part, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX>, that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> have not made done committed
executed or suffered any act or acts, thing or things whatsoever,
whereby, or by means whereof, the above mentioned and described premises, or any part or parcel thereof, now are, or at any time hereafter shall or may
be impeached, charged or encumbered in any way or manner whatsoever.
M Whess Whereof. The said parties of the first part have hereunto set <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> hand and seal the day and year first above written
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">SHATED</ENAMEX> AND DENEARD IN THE PRESENCE OF
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">John M. Smith</ENAMEX> ℗
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Louis ⎬ Smith</ENAMEX>
as <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Trustees</ENAMEX> under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the
<ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">Last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">STATE OF NEW YORK</ENAMEX>.
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie Cond</ENAMEX>
on <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">thee</ENAMEX> <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">12th</TIMEX>
before <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">me</ENAMEX>, the subscriber untimely use appeared ⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨e known to be
the <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last will</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schimite</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX> and to be the same 
lart of the person described in and <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">who</ENAMEX> executed the wooden frament, and severally acknowledged that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> executed the same. as <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Peter</ENAMEX> 
under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>,
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Eugene P. Ouchie</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Notary Public</ENAMEX> in and for

<SBODY>4 0 0
( 1086 )
4, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">N. Y.</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">EXECUTON</ENAMEX>'S <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">DEED</ENAMEX>.
This <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">Indenture</ENAMEX>, Made this 12th
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Smith</ENAMEX> and ⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨ and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last Will and Testament</ENAMEX>
of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, late of the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>
of the first part, and <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Charles Lorence</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Margaret Lorence</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="FAMILYMEMBER">wife</ENAMEX>, of <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie
County</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX>,
of the second part,
⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨ and for and in consideration of the sum of <NUMEX TYPE="MONEY">Twenty four hundred and twenty-five Dollars</NUMEX> paid 
by the said part in, of the second part, the receipt whereof is hereby acknowledged, has granted barsinned sold and conveyor, and by these presents
do grant bargain, all and convay unto the said parties of the second part, and to <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX>, and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX> forever, all that Tract or
parcel of Land, situate in the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">State
of</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">New York</ENAMEX> being part of Lot 71 and 72 <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Township Seven</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Range Eight</ENAMEX>
of the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE.notgpe">Holland Land Companys</ENAMEX> Survey; and in a subdivision of
part of said Lots 71 and 72 made for the main <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Street Land and
Improvement Company</ENAMEX> by <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">C. F. Wilmer</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Surveyor</ENAMEX>, a map of which sub-
division is on file in <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Clerk's Office</ENAMEX> under Cover 292, the
premises hereby conveyed are designated as lot Fifteen ( 15) in Block
"B" and are described as follows:-
Beginning at a point in the southerly line of
<ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">four hundred and twenty ( 20)</NUMEX> feet easterly from its
intersection with the easterly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Cornell Street</ENAMEX>, running thence
easterly along said southerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty ( 30)</NUMEX> feet;
thence southerly at right angles to <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and
fifteen ( 15)</NUMEX> feet; thence westerly parallel with <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty
130</NUMEX> feet; and thence northerly at right angles <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and
fifteen ( 15)</NUMEX> feet to the said southerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Heath Street</ENAMEX>, at the
place of beginning, and being the same premises conveyed with other
premises to said <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX> by <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Jacob Bonner</ENAMEX> by deed dated
<TIMEX TYPE="DATE">June 12, 1895</TIMEX>, recorded in <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Clerk's Office</ENAMEX> in <ENAMEX TYPE="WORK_OF_ART">Liber 802 of
Deeds</ENAMEX> at page 96, <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">July 2, 1895</TIMEX>.
4 0 1
( 1086 )
Cogether with all and singular the tenements, hereditaments and appurtenances thereto belonging or in anywise appertaining, and the reversions
and remainders, rents, issues and profits thereon. And all the estate, right, title, interest
<ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">ham</ENAMEX> and demand whatsoever, which the said <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">testator</ENAMEX> had in <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> use use, and at the time of <ENAMEX TYPE="CHEMICAL">mercury</ENAMEX>, and when the said party
of the first part have by virtue of the said last will and testament or otherwise, of, in and to the above described premises, and every part and parcel
thereof, with the appurtenances, to have and to hold forever. And the said part is of the first part, for themselk
and for <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">administrators</ENAMEX> do
covenant promise and agree to and with the said parties of the second part, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX>, that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> have not made done committed
executed or suffered any act or acts, thing or things whatsoever,
whereby, or by means whereof, the above mentioned and described premises, or any part or parcel thereof, now are, or at any time hereafter shall or may
be impeached, charged or encumbered in any way or manner whatsoever.
M Whess Whereof. The said parties of the first part have hereunto set <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> hand and seal the day and year first above written
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">SHATED</ENAMEX> AND DENEARD IN THE PRESENCE OF
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">John M. Smith</ENAMEX> ℗
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Louis ⎬ Smith</ENAMEX>
as <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Trustees</ENAMEX> under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the
<ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">Last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">STATE OF NEW YORK</ENAMEX>.
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie Cond</ENAMEX>
on <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">thee</ENAMEX> <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">12th</TIMEX>
before <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">me</ENAMEX>, the subscriber untimely use appeared ⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨⌨e known to be
the <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last will</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schimite</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX> and to be the same 
lart of the person described in and <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">who</ENAMEX> executed the wooden frament, and severally acknowledged that <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">they</ENAMEX> executed the same. as <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Peter</ENAMEX> 
under and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">Executors</ENAMEX> of the <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.xlife">last Will and Testament</ENAMEX> of <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Frederick Schmitt</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="EVENT.rel">deceased</ENAMEX>,
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Eugene P. Ouchie</ENAMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Notary Public</ENAMEX> in and for
<ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">My</ENAMEX>.

Sc __1909</TIMEX>
<ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Lout</ENAMEX> --
